project.description: this job is triggered from URL purpose: start DSP_QA instances No build job. Only start the instance.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "***********************************************************************************" echo "Starting 3 instances of STATEFUL_DSP_QA_TESTER" echo "***********************************************************************************" GROUP_ID="sig-cc53aa4c" #stateful ACJira - 7.4 (temporary for testing) ACCOUNT_ID="act-1fd9f587"
#get all instances id of this instance instances_to_resume=$(curl -X GET -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${spotinst_token}" \ "https://api.spotinst.io/aws/ec2/group/${GROUP_ID}/statefulInstance?accountId=${ACCOUNT_ID}" | jq -c '[.response.items[] |.id]') #loop over all stateful instances in this group and resume them echo $instances_to_resume | jq -r '.[]' | while read instance do curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${spotinst_token}" \ "https://api.spotinst.io/aws/ec2/group/${GROUP_ID}/statefulInstance/${instance}/resume?accountId=${ACCOUNT_ID}" done
# resume all this group stateful curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${spotinst_token}" \ -d '{"capacity": {"minimum": 0,"maximum": 3,"target": 3}}' \ "https://api.spotinst.io/aws/ec2/group/${GROUP_ID}/capacity?accountId=${ACCOUNT_ID}?shouldResumeStateful=true"
echo "***********************************************************************************" echo "Starting 3 instances of STATEFUL_DSP_QA" echo "***********************************************************************************"
